The picture was found to be morphed thro: indicating that it was manipulated and not an original representation of the protest.
The original photo: from which the manipulated image was created, was published in a CNN report on October 13, 2020, and showed people protesting against police brutality in Nigeria, not demanding justice for Sushant Singh Rajput.
Media outlets such as FR24 News and News: further confirming its authenticity and the context in which it was taken.
The protest in Nigeria was part of the: END SARS' movement, which aimed to address issues of police brutality, kidnapping, harassment, and extortion by the Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS). Several well-known international singers and actors also tweeted in support of this movement, as reported by CNN.
